data.name: RPG Maker MV - Classic Fantasy Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
Games we grew up with often hold a special place in our hearts, and hearing the familiar melodies takes us back to a happy place.

Created by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, Classic Fantasy Music pack contains a variety of songs that will find a home in any fantasy-based game. Inspired heavily by favorite RPGs such as Final Fantasy, this pack is a familiar trip down memory lane.

This pack contains:

  • 16 BGM tracks suitable for dungeons, character themes, town themes and more.
  • Inspired by classic RPG games.
  • .ogg, .mp3 and .m4a formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

Check out our other Music Packs created by Murray Atkinson:

Wonderland Music Pack
Medieval Warfare Music Pack
Heaven and Earth Music Pack
The Agency Music Pack
Rebel Rapture Music Pack
Epic Strings Music Pack
Heist Music Pack
Emporium of Copper and Steel Music Pack
Sinister Hollows Music Pack
Spanish Guitar Strings

Tracklist:

1 - Castle in the Sky
2 - The Pregame
3 - Spanish Theme
4 - Sunday Meadows
5 - Adventure Time!
6 - Tears of Sorrow
7 - The Adventurer
8 - The Chase
9 - The Final Battle
10 - Village in the Valley
11 - Township Celebration
12 - The Heart Years For Home
13 - Pregame 2
14 - The Realm of Battle (Conquest)
15 - The Realm of Battle (Regret)
16 - War Games

data.short_description: Inspired heavily by favorite RPGs such as Final Fantasy, this pack is a familiar trip down memory lane
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
